game.name: Watch Grass Grow Simulator
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 서라운드 사운드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A real-time experience built entirely around watching grass grow, where patience turns into payoff and leaving too early means missing it.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A real-time experience built entirely around watching grass grow, where patience turns into payoff and leaving too early means missing it.
